title: Advanced Grammar In Use With Answers.3rd edition -2013[A4]
description:
Book Description
Publication Date: April 29, 2013 | ISBN-10: 1107697387 | ISBN-13: 978-1107697386 | Edition: 3
An updated version of the highly successful Advanced Grammar in Use. This third edition, with answers, is ideal for self-study. The book contains 100 units of grammar reference and practice materials, with photos and illustrations in full colour and a user-friendly layout. It is ideal for learners preparing for the Cambridge Advanced, Proficiency or IELTS examinations, and is informed by the Cambridge International Corpus, which ensures the language is authentic and up-to-date. Versions without answers or with a CD-ROM are available to purchase separately.
